name: One Shot Wasteland
description:
A top-down shooter with zombies where every gun you pick up has only one shot. Survive in a post-apocalytic arena for as long as possible, taking out the incompetent* zombies on the way.

Controls:

Aim with the mouse, then WA/directional keys can be used to move foward and backward in that direction. Fire with a mouse click, space bar or Z.

If you experiance a bug and become stuck, press R to die and restart.

*Dumb Zombies:

Zombies, being undead creatures, naturally lack the brainpower us live humans tend to have. Any unintelligent behaviour - getting stuck in walls, freezing, going the wrong way, ignoring food sources - is a result of this, and totally not because I couldn't get my pathfinding to work properly.
